Title: The Nine Lives of Fritz the Cat
Writer: Fred Halliday, Eric Monte, Robert Taylor
Actors: Skip Hinnant, Reva Rose, Bob Holt, Robert Ridgely
Plot: Fritz, now married and with a son, is desperate to escape from the domestic hell he now finds himself in. Lighting up a joint, he begins to dream about his eight other lives, hoping to find one that will provide a pleasant distraction. The drug-induced journeys he takes include spells as an astronaut, Hitler's psychiatrist, a courier travelling in hostile territory during a race war, and as a pupil of an Indian guru living in the sewers of New York.
